steps.name: Start adding multiple products to cart. Total items: 2
Click on product with title 'Customizable Mug'
Configure product options before adding to cart
Click 'Continue Shopping' button on cart popup
Click on product with title 'Hummingbird Printed T-Shirt'
Configure product options before adding to cart
Click 'Proceed to checkout' button on cart popup
Click 'Proceed to checkout' button on shopping cart page
Select payment method 'Pay by Cash on Delivery'
